about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Astrometica through its breathtaking original soundtrack. From the vast emptiness of space to the bustling asteroid belts and the mysteries of alien ruins, every track is crafted to transport you into the heart of the Astrometica universe.

🎶 What’s Included:

  • Over +35 tracks of atmospheric, ambient, and dynamic space music.

  • Original compositions that blend orchestral, electronic, and sci-fi elements.

  • Tracks covering exploration, survival, mystery, and combat themes.

  • High-quality audio files (MP3 and FLAC).

🪐 Highlights:

  • Relive the tension of exploring asteroid belts, the serenity of floating islands, and the thrill of discovery.

  • Experience the music that brought Astrometica's universe to life.

  • Perfect for background listening, creative work, or to simply relive your space-faring adventures.

Whether you’re a fan of the game or just love sci-fi-inspired soundtracks, this is your chance to dive deeper into the atmosphere of Astrometica.
